CustomField.description: ** Conditionally Required ** Required if a Subscription Item and Subscription Plan configuration has "Require Valid Payment Method" checked. The Payment Method must also be related to the purchasing/subscribing Account or Contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Conditionally Required ** Required if a Subscription Item and Subscription Plan configuration has "Require Valid Payment Method" checked. The Payment Method must also be related to the purchasing/subscribing Account or Contact.
CustomField.label: Payment Method
